landing.heroSubtitle: Discover the right path for your future based on your SPM results. Get personalised recommendations from over 300 courses across polytechnics, universities, and TVET institutions.
landing.step1Desc: Tell us your SPM results and we'll find courses you're eligible for.
landing.step2Desc: Answer a few questions about what you enjoy to get personalised matches.
landing.step3Desc: See courses ranked by how well they fit your profile and preferences.
landing.readySubtitle: Join thousands of SPM leavers who have found their ideal course using HalaTuju.

onboarding.streamSubtitle: This helps us show you the right subjects for grade entry.
onboarding.gradesSubtitle: We use your grades to check which courses you're eligible for.
onboarding.profileSubtitle: Some courses have specific requirements. This helps us filter accurately.
onboarding.healthNote: Some courses have health requirements. Check if any apply to you.

dashboard.title: Your Course Recommendations
dashboard.subtitle: Based on your SPM grades and profile, here are courses you qualify for.
dashboard.noProfileDesc: Please complete the onboarding to see your recommendations.
